product_id.description: The Product ID of the account

external_ids.description: An array of static references to ID fields in a third party system.

merchant_name.description: A merchant name associated with the account

lender_name.description: A lender name associated with the account

credit_limit_cents.description: For accounts created under credit products, total Amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

max_approve_cents.description: For accounts created under credit products, total Amount (in cents) that this account can borrow.

interest_rate_account_default.description: The percentage interest applied to the account during default, or non-promotional periods (i.e. 6.2%)

existing_customers.description: Array of existing customer IDs to be added to the account. At least one existing *OR* one new customer must be included in account creation.

customer_id.description: Canopy-generated unique ID for this customer

customer_account_role.description: The role of the customer for the account. For instance, 1 may correspond to a primary account holder while 2 corresponds to secondary.
